mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, nm.*,t.name as teacher_name from (select n.*,m.name as manager_name from notice n left outer join managers m on n.manager_number = m.manager_number order by notice_no asc) nm left outer join teacher t on nm.teacher_number = t.teacher_number ) order by rnum desc

select nm.*,t.name as teacher_name from (select n.*,m.name as manager_name from notice n left outer join managers m on n.manager_number = m.manager_number) nm left outer join teacher t on nm.teacher_number = t.teacher_number where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(notice_no),0)+1 cnt from notice
insert into notice values( ${numbc}, ${manager_number}, ${teacher_number}, #{notice_sub}, #{notice_con}, sysdate, #{notice_filepath}, default, null )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_sub = #{notice_sub}, notice_con = #{notice_con}, notice_date = sysdate, notice_filepath = #{notice_filepath}, notice_filename = #{notice_filename} where notice_no = ${notice_no}
update notice set hit = hit+1 where notice_no = #{notice_no}
